text: The 2017 German Open Grand Prix Gold was the fourth Grand Prix's badminton tournament of the 2017 BWF Grand Prix Gold and Grand Prix. The tournament was held at the Innogy Sporthalle in Mulheim an der Ruhr, Germany on 28 February–5 March 2017 and had a total purse of $120,000. ==Men's singles== ===Seeds=== # Jan Ø. Jørgensen (Withdrew) # Chen Long (Semifinals) # Lin Dan (Third Round) # Tian Houwei (First Round) # Ng Ka Long (Quarterfinals) # Chou Tien-chen (Champion) # Marc Zwiebler (Second Round) # Hu Yun (Third Round) #
